amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce from 11 to 10 the statutory requirement for the number of operational carriers that the U.S. Navy must have.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 60 - 363 (Roll no. 228).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Polis.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Polis amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 60 - 363 (Roll no. 228).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
